name: Distorsion
description:
- mouse left and mouse right : attract / repel all particles in the area

- wheel click for big attraction

- create star : Hold left click a small time with a lot of particles gather around the cursor

- A : create a beautiful blackhole

- Z : Create a whitehole

- X : Delete objects (except particle)

- R : Reset the scene

Thanks for reading all this and I hope you 'll enjoy yourself 

Kiss from Francia :D
